channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:32 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:32 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 12:04 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 12:04 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. item.title: 🔴 11:37 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
